about_the_game:
Straight outta the joint that birthed GunGirl2 and UNLOVED, we got another masterpiece hammered out by the award-winning game maestro Paul Schneider. Wicked Angels takes you on a gritty, mysterious joyride into the blackest pits of unholy cosmic nightmares that'll make your reality look like a Sunday picnic. Grip your sanity tight, if there’s even a shred left in this descent into the abyss.



Enter a realm where characters manifest with distinct identities, arcane mastery, and lethal weaponry. Every persona resonates with a unique vibe, spinning a raw narrative with preferences, aversions, and personal chronicles. Mold your crew, shaping their perks, talents, trinkets, and weapon mods in a symphony of chaos. Unearth side missions, delving into the shadows to refine characters and unlock their unrestrained potential.


Beneath the shadowy veil of the unknown, mysterious realms beckon—an odyssey rife with cosmic 'Mysteries' that unravel into sprawling narratives or shrouded side missions. Navigate post-apocalyptic realms and unearthly depths to rescue lost souls ensnared by the eldritch. Beyond untangling their mysteries, unite to resurrect a decayed city into an unyielding sanctuary.


Embark on a descent into the abyss, where a legion of grotesque fiends and eldritch abominations emerge with unseen powers and relentless aggression. The fan-favorite 'Heat' mechanic returns, casting consequences upon every move, drawing the wrath of abhorred monsters that strike when least expected. This hostile world despises you, driving you to the brink of madness in the quest for survival.

name: WICKED ANGELS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX / AMD Radeon 6870 HD or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible

short_description: From the studio of GunGirl2 and UNLOVED, another masterpiece by the award-winning game maestro Paul Schneider. Wicked Angels is a gritty, mysterious joyride into unholy cosmic nightmares. Grip what's left of your sanity tight in this descent into the abyss.
